name: Blood & Steam
description:
Blood & Steam is a third person Shooter with soulslike elements, in a steampunk / dark fantasy universe. In this prototype, you shoot your way through the dark catacombs of an ancient civilisation, to uncover what lies deep underground.

 The prototype was developed by a small team of 8 artists, programmers and designers. The game is provided as an .zip with an .exe. This works on windows only.

Keys:
[WASD] to walk
[Mouse 2] to aim, [Mouse 1] to shoot
[F] to heal
[E] to interact
[Shift] for dodge roll
[Strg] for sprint
[Space] for jump

Disclaimer: Current Bugs that exist (we're working on it)
- the enemy healthbar doesnt show the amount of health said enemy has, except for when only 1 enemy is alive
- you are sometimes stuck within the death screen and need to restart the game
